title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: New Towns: definition and distinction; Dependent settlements, new communities, accelerated growth centers, planned area developments, new town in town. Economic base and socio-economic policies for new town. Site selection: planning process, criteria and methods. Thoughts and concepts of new town planning; spatial planning and design guidelines; Policies in the context of National and State urbanization policies. New town planning theory, techniques, models, etc. Planning norms, standards, infrastructure requirements for new town with case studies; Project appraisal, evaluation and monitoring. Best practices of new town planning and urban design guidelines. Financing and management of new towns; Achievement and performance of new towns.
